text: Freddy Thielemans (11 September 1944 â€“ 29 January 2022) was a Belgian socialist politician. He was the mayor of the City of Brussels from 2001 to 2013. He was mayor before, for a short time in 1994. Thielemans was born in Brussels. Thielemans died on 29 January 2022 in Brussels from problems caused by a fall he had in 2016, aged 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belgian mayors Category:Politicians from Brussels Category:Socialistische Partij Anders politicians
title: Freddy Thielemans
